channel.title: All Notes on Hongzhang Shao
channel.description: Recent content in All Notes on Hongzhang Shao

item.title: A Concise Manual on How to Write an Optimization Model
item.description:
Here is a concise guide on writing an optimization model. It is organized to

  • Fit the natural flow of a technical interview discussion
  • Serve as a practical reference when collaborating with business or production teams on real-world problems.

The structure combines ideas from software system design process and the AIMMS modeling handbook. See for reference:

  • System Design Interview: A Step-By-Step Guide
  • AIMMS Modeling Handbook

item.title: Steps to Start 3D Printing
item.description:
• Buy a 3D printer. As of December 2024, an easiest-to-use printer (and probably the cheapest) is the Bambu A1 mini.
  • Get some basic PLA filament, e.g., from Amazon.
  • Register Bambu account. Install Bambu Studio on computer. Connect printer to computer.
  • Go to MakerWorld and find a model to print.
  • Print a test model. I chose the famous BENCHY model.
  • Print something minimal but useful. I chose a Clamshell Parts Box.
  • Print something with support structure. I chose a Travel folding clothes hanger.
  • Try time-lapse video shooting in printing.

item.title: Selecting the Best Cloud GPU Service as of January 2024
item.description: Summary: Vast AI is the best on-demand service for individual and academic use, provided that the user is comfortable working with cloud servers.

item.title: Understanding Linear Quadratic Regulator (LQR) in the Context of Markov Decision Processes (MDP)
Crafting Personalized Wallpapers with Your Favorite Quotes
item.description: This project is a simple, single-page web application that allows users to create custom wallpapers from text quotes. The application is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

item.title: Crafting a 2048 Game with AI's Help
item.description: My discovery of the AI code editor Cursor was nothing short of a revelation, given its remarkable capabilities. Inspired, I decided to challenge it with the creation of a simple game: 2048.
